name: Infinite Temple
description:
While exploring an ancient site, you have triggered a trap system inside a temple.
Use your quick-thinking ability and expert controls to avoid skeletons and traps and collect various artifacts.
Various types of treasure-hunting adventurers are waiting for you!
Join them and uncover the secrets of ancient shrines!

- 4-button control system
- Retro pixel graphics
- Simple, but engaging arcade game
